languages.text: На полу использованная ампула репетропина — стимулятора, улучшающего восприятие движущихся объектов, но ухудшающего видение статичных преград.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк при успехе изучения использованных ампул (зацепка для букэвента).

languages.text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
languages.original_text: На полу использованная ампула репетропина — стимулятора, улучшающего восприятие движущихся объектов, но ухудшающего видение статичных преград.

traits.locale_text: A used ampoule is lying on the ground. It contained repetropin — a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
A used ampoule is lying on the ground. It contained repetropin — a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.
An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

languages.text: 空の小瓶が地面に転がっている。その中にはレペトロピンが入っていた。レペトロピンは、動いている物体の知覚を高めるものの、止まっている障害物を見る能力を妨げる増強剤である。
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: 空の小瓶が地面に転がっている。その中にはレペトロピンが入っていた。レペトロピンは、動いている物体の知覚を高めるものの、止まっている障害物を見る能力を妨げる増強剤である。

languages.text: 地上放着一个空瓶子。这种瓶子原本是装兴奋剂的，这种兴奋剂可以强化使用者对移动物体的感知能力，但会干扰他们察觉静止障碍的能力。
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: 地上放着一个空瓶子。这种瓶子原本是装兴奋剂的，这种兴奋剂可以强化使用者对移动物体的感知能力，但会干扰他们察觉静止障碍的能力。

languages.text: En el suelo hay un vial vacío. Contenía repetropina, un estimulante que aumenta la percepción de los objetos en movimiento pero que dificulta la visión de los obstáculos inmóviles.
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: En el suelo hay un vial vacío. Contenía repetropina, un estimulante que aumenta la percepción de los objetos en movimiento pero que dificulta la visión de los obstáculos inmóviles.

languages.text: Eine leere Phiole liegt auf dem Boden. Sie hat einmal Repetropin enthalten, ein Stimulans, das die Wahrnehmung sich bewegender Objekte schärft, dafür aber die Fähigkeit behindert, stationäre Hindernisse zu sehen.
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Eine leere Phiole liegt auf dem Boden. Sie hat einmal Repetropin enthalten, ein Stimulans, das die Wahrnehmung sich bewegender Objekte schärft, dafür aber die Fähigkeit behindert, stationäre Hindernisse zu sehen.

languages.text: Vous trouvez une fiole vide au sol. Elle contenait de la répétropine, un stimulant qui augmente la perception des objets mobiles, mais réduit la capacité à voir des obstacles immobiles.
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Vous trouvez une fiole vide au sol. Elle contenait de la répétropine, un stimulant qui augmente la perception des objets mobiles, mais réduit la capacité à voir des obstacles immobiles.

languages.text: Yerde boş bir şişe buluyorsun. İçinde, hareket eden nesneleri algılama yetisini güçlendiren ama sabit engelleri görme becerisini kısıtlayan bir uyarıcı olan repetropin varmış.
languages.original_text: An empty vial is lying on the ground. It contained repetropine, a stimulant that heightens one's perception of moving objects but hinders their ability to see stationary obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Boş bir şişe yerde duruyor. İçinde, kişinin hareket eden nesneleri algılama yetisini güçlendiren ama sabit engelleri görme yeteneğini kısıtlayan bir uyarıcı olan repetropin bulunuyormuş.
